issue.title: [C++][Parquet]Parquet Modular Encryption
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8018](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8018). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While Parquet encryption code is a part of the Arrow 0.16.0 release, this feature doesn't appear in the current changelog ("silent release").  The goal of this Jira is to add it explicitly in the next major Arrow version log.
